item.title: Dotfiles
item.description: These are my awesome (actually horrible) dotfiles. Screenshots are located in the imgs folder and shown in README’s. This is a web version of the README. Go to the dotfiles repository for more things. Changing stuff to make it work/fit your needs You probably will and must change something in my dotfiles. I recommend looking through these dotfiles and changing things to fit your setup and/or needs if you want to use this.

item.title: Tech Stuff
item.description: A list of technology related stuff used by me. Table Of Contents Stuff I Use The Computer Programs How It Looks Stuff That This Site Uses Stuff I Use The Computer Actually it’s a laptop not a cumputer. It’s a HP 250 G4 I think. Programs OS Void Linux Browser Firefox
